level.heading: Listing of odometer readings.
level.text: The Department of Public Works shall list the odometer readings at the time of registration or transfer of registration on the title of all motor vehicles registered in the District.

level.heading: Cross references
level.text: Registration of motor vehicles, issuance and expiration of registration documents, see § 50-1501.02.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 5-162
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-162, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-501.
